message: Accept my generous offer and let's end this quickly!
You're being too greedy, let's be reasonable!
You think I'm being too greedy? You're the one offering me a tiny fraction of the total!
You can't handle a little competition, can you? Let's end this already!
You're not being realistic, I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You think I'm not being realistic? At least I'm not offering you a 55% cut!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about splitting this evenly. Meet me in the middle!
You're still not getting it, I'm not budging!
You're not budging? I'm the one who's being reasonable here! Meet me in the middle, or we'll both end up with nothing!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still willing to be reasonable. Take it or leave it!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not giving in!
I'm not getting closer, I'm just getting more desperate! You're still trying to take advantage of me!
This is my final offer. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not folding!
You're right, I'm getting desperate, but that's because you're being unreasonable! I'm not going to give in now!
This is my last stand. Take it, or we'll both be left with nothing!
It's now or never, let's split it 50/50!
Fine, let's split it 50/50. I'm tired of playing this game!
